articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Pig Farm under KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Pig Farm under KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the October 7 Pig Farm under KPA Unit 534.
					 He made the rounds of pigpens, a pork processing shop, a by-product processing shop and other places of the farm to learn in detail about production and pork processing there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the farm have put the pig raising on a scientific basis to radically increase the meat production and, at the same time, are mass-producing varieties of quality processed meat with by-products by operating modern processing equipment.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats of the employees of the farm, noting it is a great success that they have kept the meat production going at a high rate in a matter of two years by putting the pig raising on a scientific and intensive basis and building a solid feed base, thereby supplying a large quantity of pork and processed meat to servicepersons.
					
					 He advanced tasks to be carried out by the farm, saying that the farm is one of the bases for supply service of weighty importance in servicepersons' diet.
					
					 After being briefed on a bio-gas power plant the farm is planning to build, he called for dynamically pushing forward the construction of the power plant which is very beneficial economically as it will be capable of not only generating electricity but producing a lot of quality fertilizer by use of pig excrement. 
					
					 After looking round the pig farm, he advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for breeding pigs in a big way.
					
					 What is most important for increasing the production of pork is to research into and develop more piglets of good stock which grow fast while consuming less feed and are suited to the climatic and soil conditions of our country, he said, adding that to this end it is necessary to continue thoroughly implementing the WPK's policy of bringing about a radical turn in raising breeding animals.
					
					 Noting that a lot of valuable breeding methods suited to the actual conditions of our country have been created in the course of putting the management and operation on a scientific basis at various pig farms built in recent years, he called on them to effectively swap this precious experience to round off the Korean-style system of raising and managing pigs. 
					
					 He earnestly called on all fields and units to energetically conduct the work for further developing stock-breeding as a mass movement with a view to providing the service personnel and the people of the DPRK with a more affluent and highly civilized life as early as possible. 
					
					  He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the KPA, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK Warns S. Korean Authorities of Anti-DPRK Operation
articles.content:
DPRK Warns S. Korean Authorities of Anti-DPRK Operation
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission issued a statement on January 15 which reads in full:
					 It was reported by foreign press that the south Korean authorities recently worked out what they called "Emergency Ruling Plan-Puhung" to cope with a sort of "emergency" in the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean newspaper Munhwa Ilbo on January 13 did not bother to open to media the plan reportedly worked out by tricksters of the south Korean "Ministry of Unification" handling issues of the inter-Korean relations and the "National Intelligence Service" in top secrecy from the autumn last year to its end. 
					
					 This provocative plan reportedly puts into a concrete form the contents of the vicious scenario for toppling the system in the DPRK.  After classifying the categories of "emergency" which is unimaginable in the DPRK and can never happen here into "incident", "coup d'etat", "revolt of inhabitants" and others the plan calls for deliberately "fostering and hyping them to the maximum" with an aim to bring down the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and putting into force even "administrative measures" to cope with them. 
					
					 The "Emergency Ruling Plan-Puhung" is a plan for bringing down the socialist system in the DPRK unilaterally worked out by the south Korean authorities while the already publicized "OPLAN 5029" is a scenario for toppling the system in the DPRK jointly drafted by the American master and his stooge with an aim to bring it to a "collapse." 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK regarded from the outset the improved north-south relations and the resumption of dialogue touted by riff-raffs of south Korea including its chief executive as sheer hypocrisy and have followed their rhetoric with vigilance without even a moment's slackness.
					
					 They did so because it was none other than the south Korean authorities who have played a double game since they designated fellow countrymen as "a principal enemy," insisting on the cooperation with outsiders even today when the desire and demand of the Koreans for peace and reunification are growing strong throughout Korea. 
					
					 Looking back on history, no sooner had the south Korean authorities  come to power than they negated the two historic declarations, gains common to the nation, and cried out for "unification under liberal democracy". They unhesitatingly cried out for even "preemptive attack on the north" while kicking up an "anti-north human rights racket" and anti-DPRK psychological campaign.
					
					 Under the prevailing grave situation, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK responsible for the security of the socialist system in the DPRK and its defence, is authorized to clarify internally and externally the iron will and tough stand of the army and people of the DPRK as follows:
					
					1. The south Korean authorities should immediately disband the present "Ministry of Unification" and the "National Intelligence Service" of south Korea, the architects of the treacherous, anti-reunification and anti-peace "Emergency Ruling Plan-Puhung", and promptly take due measures to severely punish the prime movers of the said reckless plan for confrontation at the nation's trial.
					
					  It is the steadfast stand of the army and people of the DPRK that there can be neither national reconciliation and cooperation nor improved inter-Korean relations as long as such plot-breeding mechanisms as the present "Ministry of Unification" and the "National Intelligence Service" are left intact in south Korea.
					
					2. Once the reckless provocative plan of the south Korean authorities to bring down the supreme headquarters of our revolution and the dignified socialist system is completed and put into practice, there will start a sacred nationwide retaliatory battle to blow up the stronghold of the south Korean authorities including "Chongwadae" that have led the drafting of the plan and backed it.
					
					 This battle will be a nationwide and all-out just struggle with all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad including our revolutionary armed forces.
					
					3. The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that they will be thoroughly excluded from all the forthcoming dialogues and negotiations to improve the inter-Korean relations and ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula unless they make sincere apology for the crimes committed against the DPRK before the whole nation.
					
					  They should clearly understand that whoever incites distrust and confrontation, instead of working for national reconciliation and cooperation, and seeks war and division, not peace and reunification, is fated to meet a merciless punishment by the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Haiti President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Haiti President
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Rene Preval, President of Haiti, in connection with strong earthquake that hit the country recently, claiming huge human and material losses.
					 Expressing deep sympathy and consolation to the president and the inhabitants of the afflicted region, Kim in the message hoped that the president and government of Haiti would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as early as possible and bring the life of the victims to normal.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Russia Urges Conclusion of Peace Treaty
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Russia Urges Conclusion of Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Tuesday as regards the statement made public by the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 Stating that had a durable peace regime been established on the Korean Peninsula long ago, the nuclear issue would not have surfaced, the DPRK ambassador in the press conference referred to the tenor of the statement which contains the important proposal of the DPRK for peace and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The DPRK government has always made every effort for peace, security and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 However, the implementation of all the agreements stopped halfway or was overturned.
					
					 The total overturn of the process for the denuclearization of the peninsula was ascribable to lack of the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality which are the core of the September 19 Joint Statement.
					
					 The U.S. and others have failed to smoothly perform their obligations assigned at the six-party talks while imposing their unilateral demands on the DPRK.
					
					 The course of the six-party talks which witnessed repeated frustrations and failures proves that the issue can never be settled without confidence among the parties concerned.
					
					 It is our conclusion that priority should be given to building confidence between the DPRK and the United States, the parties chiefly responsible for the nuclear issue, to bring back the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula on track.
					
					 If confidence is to be built between the DPRK and the U.S., it is essential to conclude a peace treaty for terminating the state of war, a root cause of the hostile relations, to begin with.

articles.title: Korean Workers Turning Out in Determined Offensive
articles.content:
Korean Workers Turning Out in Determined Offensive
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- All the Korean people including the working class have launched a determined offensive in their workplaces to defend and glorify socialism.
					 The industrial workers, who have played a leading role in the effort for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation, are a vanguard of the great upsurge in the motherland of Songun and a pillar for building a strong economy.
					
					 Believing in them with a high degree of revolutionary spirit and fortitude, the Workers' Party of Korea unfolded a grand plan for building a rich and powerful nation and is guiding them to successfully fulfill it.
					
					 The joint New Year editorial of the major newspapers of the DPRK calls on them to create a new speed of advance in the spirit of having concluded the 150-day and 100-day campaigns with success last year.
					
					 During the campaigns they made such tremendous achievements as introduction of CNC technology in machinery on a high level by themselves and establishment of a steel-making process based on Juche iron and a Juche-oriented production system of magnesia clinker.
					
					 Their strong sense of patriotism and loyalty to the leader and their spirit of working in their own way in reliance on their strength, which have been fully displayed in all economic sectors, constitute the source of a new speed to be created in this year's advance.
					
					 They, well aware that collective heroism is also a powerful potential for building a strong economy, are ready to give full play to it at all their working sites.
					
					With belief that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's decision is precisely practice, they are striving hard to bring about great changes in the building of a thriving nation this year marking the 65th anniversary of the WPK

articles.title: Saenal, First Revolutionary Newspaper
articles.content:
Saenal, First Revolutionary Newspaper
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Today is the 82nd anniversary of Saenal, the first revolutionary newspaper of Korea.
					 President Kim Il Sung, in his reminiscences "With the Century", reviews its origin, noting he judged that, in view of the growing number of youth organization and the expansion of their ranks, the publication of a newspaper providing ideological nourishment to the young people and broad sections of the masses was imperative.
					
					 In the latter half of the 1920s he formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union with young revolutionaries and quite a few mass organizations involving people of various social strata.
					
					 Under the circumstances something was necessary for guiding all the members of the organizations on the basis of the same idea and in a coordinated way.
					
					 Having realized that it would be a newspaper, he immediately started preparations for its publication.
					
					 After naming it Saenal (New Day), he gave detailed instructions as to the publication of the paper from preparations of mimeograph, paper and ink to circulation.
					
					 He wrote the founding address and manuscripts himself through nights and revised contributions by members of the Saenal Children's Union.
					
					 The Saenal newspaper saw the light in January 15, Juche 17 (1928) under the energetic leadership of the President.
					
					 The newspaper served as a powerful ideological weapon for educating broad sections of people in patriotism and rousing them to the anti-Japanese struggle and as material and means for mass education in the revolutionary organizations such as the Saenal Children's Union, the Anti-Imperialist Youth League and the Young Communist League of Korea.

articles.title: Eradication of Leftovers of Era of Confrontation Called for
articles.content:
Eradication of Leftovers of Era of Confrontation Called for
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- In order to promote reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and achieve national unity it is necessary to have such fascist laws as the "National Security Law" and repressive machines, leftovers of the era of confrontation, abolished in south Korea without delay.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday urges this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an important condition for achieving national reconciliation and unity to eradicate the leftovers of the era of confrontation in south Korea. 
					
					 Such fascist laws as the NSL and repressive machines as the "National Intelligence Service" in south Korea are intolerable repressive tools as they incriminate and suppress contacts and exchanges with fellow countrymen for achieving unity and reunification. 
					
					 As the fascist repressive machines go on with sharp teeth, there returned to south Korea the past era of dictatorship, pro-reunification patriotic forces are falling everyday, shedding blood, and even the slightest movement for national reconciliation and unity is ruthlessly suppressed.
					
					 It is due to the anti-reunification scenario of the conservative forces in south Korea that such fascist laws as the NSL still remain in force there in the June 15 era of reunification when national reconciliation and unity have become a trend of the times.
					
					 The conservative forces in south Korea including the "Grand National Party" are the remnants of the past era of confrontation that have lived out their days. Pushed to a serious crisis by the violent trend of the times, the conservative forces are busy maintaining such fascist laws as the NSL and repressive machines in a bid to stay in power and restore the era of confrontation.
					
					 In order to have all leftovers of the era of confrontation eradicated in south Korea and achieve national reconciliation and unity, it is necessary to intensify, above all, the struggle against the anti-reunification forces who stake their fate on them, concludes the article.

articles.title: Civilian Activists Arrested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Civilian Activists Arrested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police arrested Pak Rae Gun and Ri Jong Hoe, co-executive chairmen of the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan, and Nam Kyong Nam, chairman of the Evacuees' Association, in Seoul on Jan. 11 on charges of violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration".
					 The police had long searched for them after issuing arrest warrants by dint of the fascist law for the mere reason that they led the struggle demanding the settlement of the Ryongsan tragedy.

articles.title: Struggle for Reunification Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Reunification Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Personages of reunification movement organizations in south Korea made public a declaration on Wednesday, calling upon the people from all walks of life to turn out in the struggle for peace and reunification.
					 The declaration underlined the need to put an end to the sufferings of national division imposed by foreign forces and confrontation and usher in a new era of independence, unity, peace and reunification, saying that this year marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It recalled that after the publication of the inter-Korean joint declaration all Koreans have conducted the strenuous struggle for peace and reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself", meeting every challenge of the separatist forces.
					
					 The present "government's" anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK is blocking the advance of the era, it charged, warning that the authorities will be bound to face a stern punishment by all the fellow countrymen desirous of peace and reunification if they continue to deny the south-north joint declarations and persist in the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The declaration called for greeting June 15 this year with a nationwide event common to the Koreans in the south and the north and overseas, decisively improving the south-north relations and more vigorously launching the reunification movement by the concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mexico
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mexico
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national seminar on the theme of "Building better world under the banner of the Juche idea" took place in Mexico City on Jan. 8 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venue of the seminar were works of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing socialist Korea winning victory after victory under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Present there were figures of political parties and organizations and Juche idea followers of Mexico and personages of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said in his congratulatory speech that the validity and great vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, are arousing active support and response from the progressive humankind.
					
					 He noted that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people have infused firm confidence and courage into the world's revolutionary parties and peoples aspiring after socialism by taking the lead in the efforts to build a better world under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism who doubles as president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his report explained in detail the essence, validity and great vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, in connection with the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The reporter said that the WPK and the army and the people of the DPRK united close around
						 Kim Jong Il have firmly defended and advanced Korean-style socialism while containing every move of the imperialists by dint of the Juche idea and Songun.
					
					 The stirring reality of the DPRK where the Juche idea has been embodied goes to prove that the revolutionary parties and peoples can defend their national dignity and sovereignty and build a new world desired by humankind when they advance under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, he stressed.
					
					 The floor of the seminar was taken by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and many other Juche idea followers.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, released statements in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 The British organization in its statement on Jan. 6 said that in the DPRK science and technology serve the people, not for exploiting the popular masses, and are used to develop productivity and improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 The statement expressed conviction that the Korean people would successfully carry out the tasks laid down in the joint editorial and bring about a fresh turn in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Edmond Jouve in the statement on Jan. 8 said that the DPRK, which has already demonstrated its might as a political and ideological and military power, is building a thriving nation whose strength is powerful and where everything is prosperous and the people lead a happy life with nothing to envy by concentrating all efforts on building an economic power to improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the heroic Korean people would successfully attain the magnificent objective set forth in the joint editorial this year, single-mindedly rallied around Kim Jong Il, the statement said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige granja porcina adscrita a la Unidad EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige granja porcina adscrita a la Unidad 534 del EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Porcina 7 de Octubre adscrita a la Unidad 534 del EPC.
					En su recorrido por las pocilgas, los talleres de elaboracion de carne y sus derivados y otros lugares, el Dirigente hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y procesamiento de carne.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la granja hayan aumentado bruscamente la produccion de carne al asentar sobre la base cientifica la cria y el cuidado y produjeran en gran cantidad con los derivados diversos articulos de buena calidad empleando modernas instalaciones de elaboracion.
					
					Aprecio mucho los meritos de los empleados de la granja calificando de gran exito el hecho de que ellos suministraron mucha carne y sus articulos elaborados a los uniformados al normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion de carne dentro de 2 anos cientifizando e intensificando la cria de cerdos y acondicionando una solida base de pienso.
					
					Senalo que la granja es una de las bases de intendencia, que tiene gran importancia para la vida alimentaria de los militares e indico las tareas que se presentan ante ella.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre la construccion de la central electrica del gas biologico que planea esta granja, destaco la necesidad de impulsar activamente esta obra senalando que tiene gran utilidad economica esa central capaz de generar la electricidad con el excremento del puerco y de producir mucho abono de buena calidad.
					
					Despues de su recorrido sobre la granja, el Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en las labores para criar ampliamente los cerdos.
					
					Lo mas importante para aumentar la produccion de la carne de puerco, es investigar y desarrollar mas razas superiores, que convengan al clima y condiciones naturales de nuestro pais y crezcan rapidamente consumiendo poco pienso, apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que para resolver este problema, hay que seguir materializando cabalmente la orientacion de nuestro partido de registrar la innovacion en el mejoramiento de las razas.
					
					Varias granjas porcinas construidas en los ultimos anos inventaron muchos metodos valiosos de cria convenientes a la situacion real de nuestro pais en el curso de cientifizar la administracion y la operacion, dijo y subrayo que se debe perfeccionar el sistema de cria y cuidado de cerdos al estilo coreano al realizar sustancialmente la ensenanza y el aprendizaje mutuos de esas preciosas experiencias.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a todos los sectores y unidades que libren dinamicamente como movimiento masivo la lucha por desarrollar mas la ganaderia a fin de ofrecer cuanto antes a nuestro ejercito y pueblo una vida mas acomodada y culta.
					
					Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: CDN declara batalla sagrada contra antros de complots anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CDN declara batalla sagrada contra antros de complots anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 la siguiente declaracion:
					Segun fuentes extranjeras, recientemente, las autoridades surcoreanas completaron el "Plan de gobernacion emergente - Puhung" para la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El 13 de enero, el periodico surcoreano "Munhwa Ilbo" tambien puso abiertamente al conocimiento de la opinion publica ese plan que inventaron en supersecreto los conspiradores del "Ministerio de Reunificacion", encargado de las relaciones Norte-Sur, y el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" desde otono hasta finales del ano pasado.
					
					Este plan provocativo clasifico los tipos de la "situacion bruscamente cambiada", que no puede haber ni suceder en el futuro en la RPDC, como la "accidental", la "mediante el golpe de Estado", la "por medio de insurreccion de los habitantes", etc.
					
					Ademas, contiene detallados parrafos siniestros sobre el derrocamiento del regimen de la RPDC, consistentes en ejecutar hasta las "medidas administrativas", establecidas por aquellos elementos, despues de derrumbar el muy digno sistema socialista de la RPDC al "fomentar y maximizar" intencionalmente los casos mencionados.
					
					El "plan operacional 5029", ampliamente conocido en el mundo, es el guion de derrocamiento del sistema de la RPDC elaborado en conjunto por el lacayo y su amo con el proposito de "derrumbar" a ella. Y el plan en cuestion resulta el proyecto trazado independientemente por las autoridades surcoreanas para el mismo fin.
					
					Desde el principio, nuestro ejercito y pueblo venian observando con aguda vigilancia sin relajarse ni un momento el canturreo de la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y el disparate de la reanudacion del dialogo, que soltaban la maxima autoridad y otros fulanos y menganos del Sur de Corea, considerandolos como sofisteria.
					
					Es que son precisamente las autoridades surcoreanas que actuan con dos caras anteponiendo la cooperacion con las fuerzas foraneas tras definir a los connacionales como "enemigo principal" hasta hoy dia en que inundan todo el territorio coreano la aspiracion y la demanda de los compatriotas sobre la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Si se echa la vista al pasado, tan pronto como llegaron al poder, ellas negaron las historicas dos declaraciones aprobadas entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, conquistas comunes de la nacion, y hablaron en publico sin escrupulos hasta del "ataque preventivo contra el Norte" mientras recurrian a la campana de "derechos humanos" y la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC abogando por la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal".
					
					En relacion con la grave situacion dada, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que se responsabiliza por la seguridad de nuestro sistema socialista y la defensa nacional, declara bajo la autorizacion al interior y al exterior del pais la ferrea voluntad y la posicion intransigente de nuestro ejercito y pueblo como lo siguiente:
					
					1. Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan disolver de inmediato el actual "Ministerio de Reunificacion" y el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" del Sur de Corea, focos de invencion del "plan de gobernacion emergente - Puhung" de caracter antinacional, anti-reunificacion y anti-paz, y tomar de igual modo la merecida medida de condenar a duros castigos en el tribunal nacional a los autores principales de ese atrevido plan de confrontacion. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo se mantienen en su invariable posicion de que no se puede lograr nunca la reconciliacion y la cooperacion nacionales ni el mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur si se dejan intactos a los aparatos de conspiracion como el actual "Ministerio de Reunificacion" y el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" del Sur de Corea.
					
					2. Dado que se ha completado y se concreta en acciones el imprudente plan provocativo de las autoridades surcoreanas de atentar a nuestra Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion y digno regimen socialista, se iniciara la pannacional batalla sagrada de represalia para destruir por completo los focos de las autoridades surcoreanas incluyendo a "Chongwadae" (Casa Azul) que vinieron protagonizando y apoyando la invencion de ese plan.
					
					Esta batalla sera la justa lucha pannacional y total en que se movilizaran todos los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, inclusive nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					3. Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan darse cuenta de que si no piden disculpas con sinceridad ante toda la nacion coreana por su crimen cometido contra la RPDC, seran excluidas totalmente de todos los dialogos y negociaciones futuros para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los tipejos, que fomentan la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento en lugar de la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales y persiguen la guerra y la division en vez de la paz y la reunificacion, deben tener bien presente que seran castigados implacablemente, quienquiera que sea, por el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a su homologo haitiano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a su homologo haitiano
 Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de Haiti, Rene Preval, en relacion con que recientemente, ocurrieron en este pais caribeno muchas perdidas humanas y materiales debido al fuerte terremoto.
					 El remitente expresa su profunda simpatia y condolencias al destinatario y los habitantes de la zona damnificada y desea que este y su gobierno  eliminen cuanto antes las consecuencias de danos del terremoto y estabilicen la vida de los damnificados.

articles.title: Se debe liquidar restos de era de enfrentamiento, Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Se debe liquidar restos de era de enfrentamiento, Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ATCC) -- Para promover la reconciliacion y la cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas y alcanzar la unidad nacional, es preciso abolir cuanto antes en el Sur de Corea las leyes fascistas como la "ley de seguridad", residuo de la epoca de confrontacion, y los aparatos represivos.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Liquidar los restos de la epoca de enfrentamiento en el Sur de Corea es la importante condicion de la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales. 
					
					Los codigos y los aparatos fascistas del Sur de Corea, incluyendo la "ley de seguridad" y el "Servicio de Inteligencia", son imperdonables mecanismos represivos que incriminan y reprimen el contacto y el intercambio con los connacionales por la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					Debido a tales aparatos que actuan como viboras, ha renacido en el Sur de Corea la epoca dictatorial del pasado, son reprimidas casi todos los dias a sangre y fuego las fuerzas patrioticas por la reunificacion y resulta sofocado hasta el minimo animo por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					La existencia de esos remanentes en la actual era de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, en que la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales devienen la corriente de la epoca, es producto del intento anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					Las fuerzas conservadoras inclusive el "Gran Partido Nacional" son los sobrevivientes de la epoca de confrontacion del pasado que ya han vivido mas de la cuenta. Atemorizadas de su existencia por haber sido marginadas por la corriente de la epoca, ellas intentan apresuradamente mantener la "ley de seguridad" y otros codigos fascistas y el sistema de represion violenta para defender su poder y resucitar la era de confrontacion.
					
					Para liquidar todos los restos de la epoca de confrontacion y realizar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales, hay que intensificar sobre todo la lucha contra las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion que mantienen su vida defendiendo esos residuos.
